An overview

The vision is to standardise the UI interfaces across services.
This will help to improve consistency and a more seamless user experience.
The government design system helps to facilitate this - providing tried and tested components and patterns - that can be used to create rapid prototyping.
The prototypes can provide a "production ready" interface journey that is accessible and responsive.
A layer of customisation can then be introduced on top of this to ensure LB Redbridge branding is front and centre.
